name: Eagle Eye
effect: :instant: Draw cards from the [Spell](../spells/index.md) deck until you find a Basic [Spell](../spells/index.md) card. Take it into your hand or discard it. Reshuffle the rest of the cards back to the [Spell](../spells/index.md) deck.
expert_effect: :instant: Draw cards from the [Spell](../spells/index.md) deck until you find an Expert [Spell](../spells/index.md) card. Take it into your hand or discard it. Reshuffle the rest of the cards back to the [Spell](../spells/index.md) deck.
